title: Made in Iceland Logo font?
content:
Hi I'm new to this forum a friend recommended I ask you guys as apparently you know everything about fonts. So fingers crossed. Can anyone identify what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107175025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Madeiniceland_4779.gif)
author: nickbromage

comments.content:
Not very imaginative, but I think it actually is Reykjavik Sans. (Did that make it to LTypI yet?)  
 [Reykjavik Two D Gauge](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107175025/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/psyops/reykjavik_two_d_gauge_ot/)

The super-huge x height looks like a customization to me, but I wouldn't know, maybe there is another version of this font?
Its only the font I require, your a star thank you for telling me the name.
Not sure it qualifies for LTypI as this logo was made by the font's designer, Stefan Kjartansson. And yes, I think he made some special customizations for his studio, Armchair Media.

Oh I see, Stephen. I tele-apologize to Stefan Kjartansson then. :)

& Nick, you're welcome.
